1.Title: Tiger Spirit Rising
1.Description:
The Daze dealt by the equipper's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, and <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>28%</color>.
When using a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> to deal <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>, the DMG dealt by all squad members increases by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color>, stacking up to 2 times and lasting 30s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately. Triggers once per use of a skill. Only one instance of this effect can exist in the same squad.
